resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107281</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107281</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202664</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Edible Geometry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eßbare Geometrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Géométrie Comestible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geometria Edible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Geometria Commestibile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώδιμη γεωμετρία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Geometría Comestible</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will use food to demonstrate their understanding of the sectors and arc lengths in a circle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer benutzen Nahrung, um ihr 
Verständnis der Sektoren und der Bogenlängen in einem Kreis zu 
demonstrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants emploieront la nourriture pour 
démontrer leur arrangement des secteurs et des longueurs d'arc en 
cercle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes usarão o alimento demonstrar sua 
compreensão dos setores e dos comprimentos do arco em um círculo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi useranno l'alimento per dimostrare la 
loro comprensione dei settori e delle lunghezze dell'arco in un 
cerchio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα χρησιμοποιήσουν τα τρόφιμα για να 
καταδείξουν την κατανόησή τους των τομέων και των μηκών τόξων σε
έναν κύκλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes utilizarán el alimento para 
demostrar su comprensión de los sectores y de las longitudes del arco
en un círculo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SHARI FREDERICK
FN:SHARI FREDERICK
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107281</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
